parameters.name: FileSystemId
parameters.description: The ID of the file system.

parameters.name: Paths
parameters.description: The directories or files that you want to retrieve. You can specify a maximum of 10 paths.

parameters.name: StorageType
parameters.description:
The storage class.

*   InfrequentAccess (default): the Infrequent Access (IA) storage class.
*   Archive: the Archive storage class.
